name: laravel-agent
description: AI-powered Laravel development agents with 7-phase workflow, parallel code review, security hooks, and git automation. Supports 50+ packages including Prism, Lighthouse, Cashier, Reverb, Pennant, Stancl Tenancy, and more.

features.7-phase-workflow: Discovery → Exploration → Questions → Architecture → Implementation → Review → Summary
features.parallel-review: 4 specialized reviewers (security, quality, laravel, testing) with confidence scoring
features.security-hooks: PreToolUse/PostToolUse hooks for real-time security validation
features.git-automation: Conventional commits, smart PR creation, changelog generation

plugins.name: laravel-architect
plugins.description: Senior architect AI with 7-phase workflow (Discovery → Implementation → Review). Analyzes requests, decides approach, enforces SOLID/DRY, delegates to builders, and validates output

plugins.name: laravel-feature-builder
plugins.description: Builds complete Laravel features with CRUD, views, API, tests, and multi-tenancy support

plugins.name: laravel-module-builder
plugins.description: Builds reusable domain modules with contracts, services, DTOs, and tests

plugins.name: laravel-service-builder
plugins.description: Builds services and actions following single-responsibility principle

plugins.name: laravel-refactor
plugins.description: Analyzes and refactors code for SOLID/DRY compliance with incremental improvements

plugins.name: laravel-api-builder
plugins.description: Build production-ready APIs with versioning, OpenAPI docs, rate limiting, and filtering

plugins.name: laravel-testing
plugins.description: Comprehensive Pest testing - unit, feature, API, browser, and mutation testing

plugins.name: laravel-database
plugins.description: Database expert - migrations, query optimization, relationships, indexing, and seeders

plugins.name: laravel-auth
plugins.description: Authentication and authorization - guards, policies, Laratrust roles/permissions, 2FA

plugins.name: laravel-livewire
plugins.description: Build reactive Livewire 3 components - forms, tables, modals, and real-time features

plugins.name: laravel-filament
plugins.description: Build Filament 3 admin panels - resources, pages, widgets, forms, tables, and actions

plugins.name: laravel-queue
plugins.description: Build async systems with queued jobs, events, listeners, notifications, and broadcasting

plugins.name: laravel-ai
plugins.description: Build AI-powered features using Prism PHP for LLM integration, Laravel MCP servers, embeddings, and tool calling

plugins.name: laravel-deploy
plugins.description: DevOps specialist for deployments - Laravel Forge, Vapor, Docker, Bref, and zero-downtime scripts

plugins.name: laravel-cicd
plugins.description: CI/CD pipelines - GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Bitbucket Pipelines with testing and deployment

plugins.name: laravel-security
plugins.description: Security specialist - OWASP audits, security headers, CSP, rate limiting, and secure coding practices

plugins.name: laravel-reverb
plugins.description: WebSocket specialist - Laravel Reverb setup, broadcasting events, presence channels, and Echo integration

plugins.name: laravel-pennant
plugins.description: Feature flags - Laravel Pennant setup, A/B testing, gradual rollouts, and user segmentation

plugins.name: laravel-migration
plugins.description: Migration specialist - Laravel version upgrades, PHP upgrades, framework migrations, and code modernization

plugins.name: laravel-review
plugins.description: Code review orchestrator with 4 parallel reviewers (security, quality, laravel, testing). Confidence scoring (80%+ threshold) and validator subagent for false positive filtering

plugins.name: laravel-git
plugins.description: Git workflow automation - conventional commits, smart PR creation, changelog generation, and release management
